title: RPCDaemon in docker-compose fails invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
body:

I am using the image ` thorax/erigon:v2.43.1`
All other services are working fine

This happens for me as well on  git_branch=stable git_tag=v2.44.0-dirty git_commit=f4f10f3b7cad36d6b3e7985cfe974764df53d8f7 without docker.

When running with rpc embed with erigon everything works fine. When trying to run as a seperate proccess it looks like `--datadir` causes the crash (doesn't crash without this flag)
